layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

questions.text: I believe my choices matter because they interact with an ordered reality that responds predictably.
I believe there are better and worse ways to live â€” not all paths are equal.
I see evidence that certain behaviors consistently lead to flourishing while others lead to destruction.
I reject the idea that all choices are equally valid or that 'whatever works for you' is sufficient guidance.
I believe human action has meaning because it takes place within a structured, meaningful reality.
questions.principle: Action has meaning because reality has meaning
